alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 5:41PM EDT until April 30 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lee County in southwestern Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 541 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lehigh Acres, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Tice, Fort Myers Shores, Olga, Lehigh Acres, Gateway, Alva, East Dunbar, Buckingham and Charleston Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
